script:
1). You aren't related to Elvis Presley, are you?
I can't relate to Rock and Roll.
No, you're his relative.
Yes, as a matter of fact I am. 
2). I wonder if we're going to get raises this year.
I don't like raisins.
I hope so, I need the money. 
Yes, raising children is hard.
3). When is your birthday?
August 15th. 
In 1994.
Thank you.
